title: Behind the Burns
description: GILLIANI moved to a small city to get away from my past which leaves me hiding my body. The scars I carry on my body and in my heart force me to cover up and stay under the radar. I thought that when I got a job as a mechanic for the Hellâ€™s Reaper Motorcycle Club, that this would be a fresh start. Everything changed when I made eye contact with Bear. BEARAfter a month of being away from the Reapers to care for my mom, I was ready to return to normal club life. When I first saw Gillian, everything changed. By the time I found out what she was running from, it was too late. Will Bear be able to save Gillian from her past? Will she ever feel safe around him? Find out in Behind the Burns
author: C.E. Kingsley
